reasonableness_standard: Rule 53 allows reinstatement if there was a breach of natural justice or it is in the interests of justice.
procedural_fairness: The Board found no breach of natural justice or substantial defect.
review_standard: The standard of review is reasonableness simpliciter.
decision_outcome: The court dismissed the application for judicial review, upholding the Boardâ€™s decision.
burden_of_proof: the applicant failed to show how reinstatement was in the interests of justice.
